activeTabKey.description: The key of the currently active tab

bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

:defaultActiveTabKey.description: Initialize the key of the selected tab, if activeTabKey is not set
:defaultActiveTabKey.description_zh: 初始化选中页签的 key，如果没有设置 activeTabKey

:extra.description: The action area in the upper right corner of the card
:extra.description_zh: 卡片右上角的操作区域

hoverable.description: The mouse floats when it is moved over

loading.description: While the card content is still loading, you can use loading to display a placeholder
loading.description_zh: 当卡片内容还在加载中时，可以用 loading 展示一个占位

:tabList.description: The tab title list can be customized via the customTab(v3.0) slot
:tabList.description_zh: 页签标题列表, 可以通过 customTab(v3.0) 插槽自定义 tab

type.description: The type of card, which can be set to 'inner' or not set
type.description_zh: 卡片类型，可设置为 `inner` 或 不设置

events.name: tabChange
events.description: The callback of the tab switch

slots.name: actions
slots.description: The action list, shows at the bottom of the Card.
slots.description_zh: The action list, shows at the bottom of the Card.

slots.name: extra
slots.description: Content to render in the top-right corner of the card
slots.description_zh: Content to render in the top-right corner of the card
